checkout.validationMsg: Delivery ke patay ki tasdeeq nahi ho saki
checkout.unavailableMsg: Yeh pata dukan ke delivery zone se bahar hai. Barah-e-karam koi aur pata muntakhib karein.

orders.markDeliveredMessage: Tasdeeq karein ke yeh order deliver ho chuka hai?

orders.assignSuccess: Runner assign kar diya gaya aur order rawana kar diya gaya

openingHours.subtitle: Yahan se dukan ke auqaat, chuttiyan aur manual open / band setting control karein.

holidays.title: Custom chuttiyan

holidays.descriptionInvalid: Wazahat 2 se 6 alfaaz ke darmiyan honi chahiye.

common.failedToLoad: Load karne mein nakami. Refresh karein ya dobara koshish karein.
common.createCategoryFirstDesc: Kam az kam ek category shamil karein taake aap items munsalik kar sakein aur catalog ko munazzam rakh sakein.
common.organizeCatalog: Apne catalog ko munazzam karein. Categories talash aur filters ke sath fori tor par mutabiqat pazeer hoti hain.
common.transparencyLog: Har qeemat ki tabdeeli, SKU tarmeem, aur template sync shaffafiyat ke liye log kiya jata hai.
common.searchPlaceholder: Naam, SKU, ya barcode se talash karein

items.emptyDesc: Items dasti tor par shamil karein ya jaldi shuru karne ke liye hamare pehle se bhare hue templates se muntakhib karein.
items.deleteConfirm: Kya aap waqayi “{{name}}” ko delete karna chahte hain?
items.deleteErrorDesc: Barah-e-karam baad mein dobara koshish karein.

categories.deleteConfirm: Kya aap apni dukan se “{{name}}” delete karna chahte hain?
categories.deleteErrorDesc: Ek ya ziyada items ab bhi is category par inhasar karte hain.
categories.alreadyAddedDesc: Yeh category aap ki dukan mein pehle se majood hai.
categories.addConfirm: Kya aap “{{name}}” ko apni dukan mein shamil karna chahte hain?

summary.noChanges: Item ki tafseelat mein koi tabdeeli nahi

templates.pickerDesc: Apni inventory mein jaldi products shamil karne ke liye pehle se bhare hue item templates browse karein
templates.categoryPickerDesc: Apni inventory ko munazzam karne ke liye pehle se bhare hue category templates browse karein

createShop.title: Dukan Banayein
createShop.editImageError: Tasveer mein tarmeem karne mein nakami
createShop.nameRequired: Brah e karam dukan ka naam darj karein
createShop.descRequired: Brah e karam dukan ki tafseel darj karein
createShop.typeRequired: Brah e karam dukan ki qisam muntakhib karein
createShop.addressRequired: Brah e karam pata muntakhib karein
createShop.locationRequired: Brah e karam aik durust pata ka maqam muntakhib karein
createShop.tapToAdd: Tasveer shamil karne ke liye tap karein
createShop.descPlaceholder: Apni dukan ki wazahat karein, kya cheez isay khaas banati hai...
createShop.tagsDesc: Gahakon ko apni dukan talash karne mein madad ke liye tags shamil karein. Misalein: khusoosiyat, mashhoor ashya, waghera.

shops.title: Dukanain
shops.subtitle: Apni dukanon ka intezam karein aur karkardagi ko track karein
shops.noShopsDesc: Apni pehli dukan banayein aur apne ird gird ke gahakon ko online farokht karna shuru karein

areas.title: Delivery ke ilaqay
areas.description: Naqshay par zones banayein taake aap kahan deliver karte hain is ki wazahat ho. Gahak aap ki dukan sirf isi surat mein dekhein ge jab un ka maqam in zones ke andar ho.

runners.title: Delivery Runners
runners.description: In delivery runners ka intezam karein jo is dukan ke liye orders sambhalte hain.
runners.noRunners: Abhi tak koi delivery runner shamil nahi kiya gaya. Apna pehla runner shamil karne ke liye "Shamil karein" par click karein.
runners.deleteConfirm: Kya aap waqayi {{name}} ko hazf karna chahte hain?

logic.title: Delivery Logic
logic.description: Order ki qeemat ki had, surcharges, aur delivery ke qawaid tarteeb dein.
logic.minimumOrderValue: Kam az kam order ki qeemat
logic.minimumOrderValueDesc: Is qeemat se kam orders par surcharge lagoo hoga
logic.smallOrderSurchargeDesc: Jab order ki qeemat kam az kam se kam ho to lagoo hota hai
logic.leastOrderValue: Kam az kam order ki qeemat (sakht farsh)
logic.leastOrderValueDesc: Is qeemat se kam orders checkout par mustard kar diye jayen ge

distanceTiering.title: Faslay ki darja bandi
distanceTiering.description: Khudkar mode faslay ki bunyad par delivery fee ka hisab lagata hai. Ziyada tar tajar default tarteebat istemal karte hain.
distanceTiering.maxDeliveryFeeDesc: Ziyada se ziyada delivery fee par had

manageAreas.title: Delivery zones banayein
manageAreas.description: Neechay "Delivery ka ilaqa shamil karein" par tap karein, apne service area ke ird gird points drop karein, aur shakal mukammal karein. Riders sirf in zones ke andar orders dekhein ge.
manageAreas.noZonesYet: Abhi tak koi zone nahi. Shuru karne ke liye ek shamil karein.
manageAreas.dropPoints: Kam az kam teen points drop karein
manageAreas.discardMessage: Koi bhi ghair mehfooz shuda delivery zones zaya ho jayen ge.
manageAreas.needMorePointsMessage: Delivery ka ilaqa banane ke liye naqshay par kam az kam teen points par tap karein.
manageAreas.zonesOverlappingMessage: Delivery zones overlap nahi ho sakte. Nayay ilaqay ko adjust karein taake is ki wazeh had ho.
manageAreas.finishOrCancel: Delivery ka ilaqa mukammal ya mansookh karein
manageAreas.finishOrCancelMessage: Mehfooz karne se pehle delivery ka ilaqa mukammal karein.
manageAreas.saved: Delivery ke ilaqay mehfooz ho gaye
manageAreas.savedMessage: Aap ke service areas riders ke liye tayyar hain.
manageAreas.failedToSaveMessage: Barah-e-karam apna connection check karein aur dobara koshish karein.
manageAreas.removeAreaMessage: Riders ab is zone se orders nahi dekhein ge. Yeh karwai ek bar mehfooz karne ke baad hoti hai.
manageAreas.centerOnShop: Dukan ke maqam par markaz karein

runnerForm.description: Ek delivery runner shamil karein jo is dukan ke liye deliveries sambhalega.
runnerForm.name: Naam

logicForm.title: Delivery logic ki tarteebat
logicForm.description: Apni dukan ke liye order ki qeemat ki had aur surcharges tarteeb dein.
logicForm.minimumOrderValue: Kam az kam order ki qeemat (PKR)
logicForm.minimumOrderValueDesc: Is qeemat se kam orders par surcharge lagoo hoga. Default: 200 PKR
logicForm.smallOrderSurchargeDesc: Kam az kam qeemat se kam orders ke liye izafi fee. Default: 40 PKR
logicForm.leastOrderValue: Kam az kam order ki qeemat - sakht farsh (PKR)
logicForm.leastOrderValueDesc: Mutlaq kam az kam order ki qeemat. Is se kam orders checkout par mustard kar diye jayen ge. Default: 100 PKR
logicForm.freeDeliveryDesc: Jab order ki qeemat aur fasla in mayaroon par poor utre to muft delivery pesh karein.
logicForm.freeDeliveryThresholdDesc: Muft delivery ke liye ahal hone ke liye kam az kam order ki qeemat. Default: 800 PKR
logicForm.freeDeliveryRadiusDesc: Muft delivery ki ahliyat ke liye ziyada se ziyada delivery fasla. Default: 1000m
logicForm.addSurcharge: Orders < {{amount}} PKR: {{surcharge}} PKR surcharge shamil karein
logicForm.freeDeliveryCondition: Order ki qeemat ≥ Rs {{threshold}} aur fasla ≤ {{radius}}m

distanceForm.title: Faslay ki darja bandi
distanceForm.description: Faslay par mabni qeematon ki darja bandi tarteeb dein. Ziyada tar tajar khudkar mode istemal karte hain.
distanceForm.autoModeDesc: Khudkar mode default darja bandi wali qeematon ka istemal karta hai
distanceForm.customModeDesc: Hasb-e-zaroorat mode aap ko apni darja bandi set karne deta hai
distanceForm.fixValidationErrors: Barah-e-karam mehfooz karne se pehle tasdeeq ki ghaltiyon ko durust karein.
distanceForm.beyondLastTier: {{distance}}m se agay: Lekhari scaling {{fee}} PKR per {{unit}}m par lagoo hogi
distanceForm.maxDeliveryFeeDesc: Ziyada se ziyada delivery fee par had. Default: 130 PKR. Ziyada se ziyada: 300 PKR
distanceForm.linearScalingTitle: Akhri darjay ke baad lekhari scaling
distanceForm.linearScalingDesc: Akhri darjay se agay faslon ke liye, lekhari scaling lagoo karein. Default: +Rs 10 per 250m
distanceForm.linearScalingExample: Misaal: Agar akhri darja 1000m par khatam hota hai aur fasla 1500m hai, to izafi 500m par {{fee}} PKR per {{unit}}m charge kiya jayega
distanceForm.mustBeGreater: Pichlay darjay se ziyada hona chahiye
distanceForm.mustNotExceed: Ziyada se ziyada delivery fee ({{amount}} PKR) se ziyada nahi hona chahiye
distanceForm.mustBeZeroOrGreater: 0 ya is se ziyada hona chahiye

address.enterAddress: Apne ird gird dukanain daryaft karne ke liye pata darj karein
address.searchStart: Shuru karne ke liye koi maqam talash karein
address.pinpointHelp: Rider ko apna maqam talash karne mein madad karein
address.pinpointDesc: Hamwar delivery ke liye pin ko bilkul apni imarat ke dakhli rastay par rakhein
address.addDetails: Flat / Makan / Gali number ya mashhoor jagah shamil karein (ikhtiyari)
address.detailsPlaceholder: Misaal: Flat 2B, Makan 45, Main Gate ke qareeb
address.loginPrompt: Apne paton ka intezam karne ke liye barah-e-karam Sign Up / Login karein
address.noSavedAddresses: Abhi tak koi pata mehfooz nahi kiya gaya
address.addFirstAddress: Shuru karne ke liye apna pehla pata shamil karein
address.deleteConfirm: Kya aap waqai yeh pata hazf karna chahte hain?
address.deliveryNote: Aap ka rider pin kiye gaye maqam par deliver karega. Aap aglay safhay par apne likhay hue patay mein tabdeeli kar sakte hain.
address.useCurrentLocationUnavailable: Mera mojooda location istemal karein (Location dastiyab nahi)
